metadata.title: CVE-2017-6845 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The PoDoFo::PdfColor::operator function in PdfColor.cpp in PoDoFo 0.9.4allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.5-9
libpodofo0.9.6 - 0.9.5-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-9').
